definition: of cotton thread that has been treated with sodium hydroxide to shrink it and increase its luster and affinity for dye
details:
adjective
- of cotton thread that has been treated with sodium hydroxide to shrink it and increase its luster and affinity for dye
= example: of cotton thread that has been treated with sodium hydroxide to shrink it and increase its luster and affinity for dye
= synonyms: mercerised
